items.name: Amulet of the Planes
tags: SPROP:This amulet allows its wearer to utilize Plane Shift.

items.name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
tags: SPROP:Protects the wearer from scrying and magical location as Nondetection.

items.name: Bag of Tricks (Gray)
tags: SPROP:Animals produced are always random, and only one may exist at a time. Up to ten animals can be drawn from the bag each week, but no more than two per day.

items.name: Bag of Tricks (Rust)
tags: SPROP:Animals produced are always random, and only one may exist at a time. Up to ten animals can be drawn from the bag each week, but no more than two per day.

items.name: Bag of Tricks (Tan)
tags: SPROP:Animals produced are always random, and only one may exist at a time. Up to ten animals can be drawn from the bag each week, but no more than two per day.

items.name: Bead of Force
tags: SPROP:Upon sharp impact, the bead explodes, sending forth a burst that deals 5d6 points of force damage to all creatures within a 10-foot radius.

items.name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|VIRTUAL|Belt of Dwarvenkind ~ Languages|Dwarf ~ Stonecunning

SPROP:+4 competence bonus on Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks as they relate to dealing with dwarves, a +2 competence bonus on similar checks when dealing with gnomes and halfings, a -2 competence penalty on similar checks when dealing with anyone else, and a +2 resistance bonus on saves against poison, spells, and spell-like effects.

items.name: Boat (Folding)
tags: SPROP:If a command word is given, the box unfolds itself to form a boat.

items.name: Boots of Levitation
tags: SPROP:On command, allows the wearer to Levitate as the spell.

items.name: Boots of Speed
tags: SPROP:As free action, Haste for up to 10 rounds each day

items.name: Boots of the Winterlands
tags: SPROP:Travel across snow and slippery ice at normal speed leaving no tracks. Boots of the winterlands warm the wearer, as if he were affected by an endure elements spell.

items.name: Boots (Winged)
tags: SPROP:3/day on command, allows user to Fly, as spell for up to 5 minutes

items.name: Bottle of Air
tags: SPROP:Retains air within it at all times, continually renewing its contents.

items.name: Bracelet of Friends
tags: SPROP:When a charm is grasped and the name of the keyed individual is spoken, that person is called to the spot (a standard action)

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Lawful-Good)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if lawful-good.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Neutral-Good)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if neutral-good.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Chaotic-Good)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if chaotic-good.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Lawful-Neutral)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if lawful-neutral.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Neutral)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if neutral.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Chaotic-Neutral)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if chaotic-neutral.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Lawful-Evil)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if lawful-evil.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Neutral-Evil)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if neutral-evil.

items.name: Candle of Invocation (Chaotic-Evil)
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks while within 30 feet of the flame if chaotic-evil.

items.name: Carpet of Flying (5 ft by 5 ft)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Carpet of Flying, 5 ft. by 5 ft.

items.name: Carpet of Flying (5 ft by 10 ft)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Carpet of Flying, 5 ft. by 10 ft.

items.name: Carpet of Flying (10 ft by 10 ft)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Carpet of Flying, 10 ft. by 10 ft.

items.name: Chime of Interruption
tags: SPROP:This instrument can be struck once every 10 minutes, and its resonant tone lasts for 3 full minutes.

items.name: Cloak of Arachnida
tags: SPROP:Move as Spider Climb, immunity to web spells, +2 luck bonus on Fortitude saves against poison from spiders

items.name: Cloak of the Bat
tags: SPROP:Fly as spell in near darkness for up to 7 minutes

items.name: Cloak of Displacement (Major)
tags: SPROP:On command, Displacement up to 15 rounds/day

items.name: Cloak of Displacement (Minor)
tags: SPROP:20%% miss chance on attacks against wearer

items.name: Cloak of Etherealness
tags: SPROP:On command, Ethereal Jaunt for up to 10 minutes per day.

items.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
tags: SPROP:Gain abilities like Manta Ray when in saltwater.

items.name: Cube of Frost Resistance
tags: SPROP:Absorbs all cold-based attacks in area when activated.

items.name: Elixir of Fire Breath
tags: SPROP:3 blasts, 4d6 fire damage up to 25 ft. away.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Bronze Griffon)
tags: SPROP:Can be used twice per week for up to 6 hours per use.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Ebony Fly)
tags: SPROP:Can be used three times per week for up to 12 hours per use.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Golden Lions)
tags: SPROP:Can be used once per day for up to 1 hour per use.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephants)
tags: SPROP:Can be used four times per month for up to 24 hours at a time.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Obsidian Steed)
tags: SPROP:Can be used once per week for one continuous period of up to 24 hours.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Onyx Dog)
tags: SPROP:Can be used once per week for up to 6 hours per use.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Serpentine Owl)
tags: SPROP:Can be used once per day for up to 8 hours per use.

items.name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven)
tags: SPROP:Can be used no more than 24 hours per week but need not be continuous.

items.name: Gauntlet of Rust
tags: SPROP:Once per day, it can affect an object as with the rusting grasp spell.

items.name: Helm of Comprehend Languages and Read Magic
Horn of Blasting
tags: SPROP:On command, 5d6 sonic damage and deafened for 2d6 rounds

items.name: Horn of Blasting (Greater)
tags: SPROP:On command, 10d6 sonic damage and deafened for 4d6 rounds

items.name: Horn of Goodness/Evil
tags: SPELLS:Horn of Goodness/Evil|TIMES=1|CASTERLEVEL=6|Magic Circle against Good|PREALIGN:LE,NE,CE
SPELLS:Horn of Goodness/Evil|TIMES=1|CASTERLEVEL=6|Magic Circle against Evil|PREALIGN:LG,NG,CG

items.name: Horn of Valhalla (Silver)
tags: SPROP:Once per week can summon 2d4+2 2nd level human barbarians to fight for the character who summoned them.

items.name: Horn of Valhalla (Brass)
tags: SPROP:Once per week can summon 2d4+1 3rd level human barbarians to fight for the character who summoned them.|PREMULT:1,[PRECLASS:1,SPELLCASTER=1],[PREVARGTEQ:CasterLevel_Highest,1]
SPROP:Once per week can summon 2d4+1 3rd level human barbarians that attack the character who summoned them.|!PREMULT:1,[PRECLASS:1,SPELLCASTER=1],[PREVARGTEQ:CasterLevel_Highest,1]

items.name: Horn of Valhalla (Bronze)
tags: SPROP:Once per week can summon 2d4 4th level human barbarians to fight for the character who summoned them.|PREMULT:1,[PREABILITY:1,CATEGORY=Special Ability,All Martial Weapon Proficiencies],[PREVARGTEQ:BardicPerformanceLVL,1]

SPROP:Once per week can summon 2d4 4th level human barbarians that attack the character who summoned them.|!PREMULT:1,[PREABILITY:1,CATEGORY=Special Ability,All Martial Weapon Proficiencies],[PREVARGTEQ:BardicPerformanceLVL,1]

items.name: Horn of Valhalla (Iron)
tags: SPROP:Once per week can summon 1d4+1 5th level human barbarians to fight for the character who summoned them.|PREMULT:1,[PREABILITY:1,CATEGORY=Special Ability,All Martial Weapon Proficiencies],[PREVARGTEQ:BardicPerformanceLVL,1]

SPROP:Once per week can summon 1d4+1 5th level human barbarians that attack the character who summoned them.|!PREMULT:1,[PREABILITY:1,CATEGORY=Special Ability,All Martial Weapon Proficiencies],[PREVARGTEQ:BardicPerformanceLVL,1]

items.name: Horseshoes of a Zephyr
tags: SPROP:Nonsolid or unstable surfaces can be crossed, and movement is possible without leaving tracks on any sort of ground

items.name: Ioun Stone (Clear Spindle)
tags: SPROP:Sustains creature without food or water

items.name: Ioun Stone (Dusty rose Prism)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Dusty rose Prism

items.name: Ioun Stone (Deep red Sphere)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Deep red Sphere

items.name: Ioun Stone (Incandescent blue Sphere)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Incandescent blue Sphere

items.name: Ioun Stone (Pale blue Rhomboid)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Pale blue Rhomboid

items.name: Ioun Stone (Pink and green Sphere)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Pink and green Sphere

items.name: Ioun Stone (Scarlet and blue Sphere)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Scarlet and blue Sphere

items.name: Ioun Stone (Dark blue Rhomboid)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Dark blue Rhomboid

items.name: Ioun Stone (Pale lavender Ellipsoid)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Pale lavender Ellipsoid
SPROP:Absorbs spells of 4th level or lower

items.name: Ioun Stone (Pearly white Spindle)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Pearly white Spindle
SPROP:Regenerate 1 point of damage per 10 minutes

items.name: Ioun Stone (Pale green Prism)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Pale green Prism

items.name: Ioun Stone (Vibrant purple Prism)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Vibrant purple Prism
SPROP:Stores three levels of spells, as a ring of spell storing

items.name: Ioun Stone (Lavender and green Ellipsoid)
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Ioun Stone / Lavender and green Ellipsoid
SPROP:Absorbs spells of 8th level or lower

items.name: Lantern of Revealing
tags: SPROP:Reveals all invisible creatures and objects within 25 feet.

items.name: Medallion of Thoughts
tags: SPROP:allows the wearer to read the thoughts of others, as with the spell detect thoughts.

items.name: Necklace of Adaptation
tags: SPROP:Wraps the wearer in a shell of fresh air

items.name: Pearl of the Sirines
tags: SPROP:Breathe in water, swim speed is 60ft, cast spells and act underwater without hindrance.

items.name: Periapt of Health
tags: SPROP:Immune to Disease, including supernatural diseases

items.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
tags: SPROP:Automatically becomes stable if hit-points drop below 0 and doubles the wearer's normal rate of healing

items.name: Phylactery of Faithfulness
tags: SPROP:Wearer is aware of any action or item that could adversely affect his alignment and his standing with his deity

items.name: Restorative Ointment
tags: SPROP:Each dose neutralizes poison, cures disease, or 1d8+5 Hp.

items.name: Robe of the Archmagi (White)
tags: SPROP:+2 enhancement bonus to overcome spell resistance.|PREMULT:1,[PRECLASS:1,SPELLCASTER.Arcane=1],[PREVARGTEQ:Caster_Level_Highest__Arcane,1]

items.name: Robe of the Archmagi (Grey)
tags: SPROP:+2 enhancement bonus to overcome spell resistance.|PREMULT:1,[PRECLASS:1,SPELLCASTER.Arcane=1],[PREVARGTEQ:Caster_Level_Highest__Arcane,1]

items.name: Robe of the Archmagi (Black)
tags: SPROP:+2 enhancement bonus to overcome spell resistance.|PREMULT:1,[PRECLASS:1,SPELLCASTER.Arcane=1],[PREVARGTEQ:Caster_Level_Highest__Arcane,1]

items.name: Robe of Blending
tags: SPROP:Adopt the appearance of another creature, as with the disguise self spell, at will.

items.name: Robe of Eyes
tags: ABILITY:Special Ability|AUTOMATIC|Retain Dex To AC ~ Flat-footed
SPROP:Retains Dexterity bonus to AC even when flat-footed and can't be flanked. See all forms of invisible or ethereal things within 120 feet.

items.name: Robe of Stars
tags: SPROP:Travel physically to the Astral Plane

items.name: Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone)
tags: SPROP:+1 Luck bonus to ability checks

items.name: Strand of Prayer Beads (Lesser)
tags: SPROP:Bead of Blessing 1/day -- Wearer can cast bless.  Bead of Healing 1/day -- Wearer can cast his choice of Cure Serious Wounds, Remove Blindness/Deafness, or Remove Disease.

items.name: Strand of Prayer Beads
tags: SPROP:Bead of Healing 1/day -- Wearer can cast his choice of cure serious wounds, remove blindness/deafness, or remove disease.  Bead of Karma 1/ day -- Wearer casts his spells at +4 caster level. Effect lasts 10 minutes.  Bead of Smiting 1/day -- Wearer can cast chaos hammer, holy smite, order's wrath, or unholy blight (Will DC 17 partial).

items.name: Strand of Prayer Beads (Greater)
tags: SPROP:Bead of Healing 1/day -- Wearer can cast his choice of cure serious wounds, remove blindness/deafness, or remove disease.  Bead of Karma 1/ day -- Wearer casts his spells at +4 caster level. Effect lasts 10 minutes.  Bead of Summons 1 time only -- Summons a powerful creature of appropriate alignment from the Outer Planes (an angel, devil, etc.) to aid the wearer for one day. (If the wearer uses the bead of summons to summon a deity's emissary frivolously, the deity takes that character's items and places a geas/quest upon him as punishment in the very least.)  Bead of Wind Walk 1/day -- Wearer can cast Wind Walk

items.name: Wind Fan
tags: SPROP:20%% cumulative chance of destruction after first use each day.

items.name: Wings of Flying
tags: SPROP:Fly speed of 60 ft with average maneuverability.

items.name: Ring of Chameleon Power
tags: SPROP:As a free action, the wearer of this ring can gain the ability to magically blend in with the surroundings. This provides a +10 competence bonus on her Stealth checks. As a standard action, she can also command the ring to utilize the spell Disguise Self as often as she wants.

items.name: Ring of Counterspells
tags: SPROP:Counterspells any spell stored in ring when next cast on wearer.

items.name: Ring of Djinni Calling
tags: SPROP:When the ring is rubbed, the djinni appears on the next round.

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Minor/Acid)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Acid Energy Resistance, Minor

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Major/Acid)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Acid Energy Resistance, Major

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater/Acid)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Acid Energy Resistance, Greater

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Minor/Cold)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Cold Energy Resistance, Minor

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Major/Cold)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Cold Energy Resistance, Major

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater/Cold)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Cold Energy Resistance, Greater

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Minor/Electricity)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Electricity Energy Resistance, Minor

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Major/Electricity)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Electricity Energy Resistance, Major

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater/Electricity)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Electricity Energy Resistance, Greater

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Minor/Fire)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Fire Energy Resistance, Minor

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Major/Fire)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Fire Energy Resistance, Major

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater/Fire)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Fire Energy Resistance, Greater

tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Sonic Energy Resistance, Minor

tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Sonic Energy Resistance, Major

items.name: Ring of Energy Resistance (Greater/Sonic)
tags: OUTPUTNAME:Ring of Sonic Energy Resistance, Greater

items.name: Ring of Evasion
tags: SPROP:Grants the ability to avoid damage as if she had evasion.

items.name: Ring of Friend Shield
tags: SPROP:Either wearer of one of a pair of the rings can, at any time, command his ring to cast a Shield Other spell with the wearer of the mated ring as the recipient.

items.name: Ring of Mind Shielding
tags: SPROP:Grants immunity to Detect Thoughts, Discern Lies, and any attempt to magically discern alignment.

items.name: Ring of Regeneration
tags: SPROP:This white gold ring is generally set with a large green sapphire. When worn, the ring continually allows a living wearer to heal 1 point of damage per round and an equal amount of nonlethal damage. In addition, he is immune to bleed damage while wearing a ring of regeneration. If the wearer loses a limb, an organ, or any other body part while wearing this ring, the ring regenerates it as the spell. In either case, only damage taken while wearing the ring is regenerated.

items.name: Ring of Sustenance
tags: SPROP:This ring continually provides its wearer with life-sustaining nourishment.

items.name: Ring of X-Ray Vision
tags: SPROP:On command, this ring gives its possessor the ability to see into and through solid matter.

items.name: Ring of Blinking
tags: SPROP:On command, this ring makes the wearer blink, as with the Blink spell.

items.name: Ring of Elemental Command (Earth)
tags: SPELLS:Magic Item|TIMES=ATWILL|CASTERLEVEL=15|Meld into Stone|Soften Earth and Stone

items.name: Ring of Feather Falling
tags: SPROP:Acts as Feather Fall spell, activated immediately if the wearer falls more than 5 feet

items.name: Ring of Freedom of Movement
tags: SPROP:This gold ring allows the wearer to act as if continually under the effect of a Freedom of Movement spell.

items.name: Ring of Invisibility
tags: SPROP:By activating this simple silver ring, the wearer can benefit from Invisibility, as the spell.

items.name: Ring of Spell Turning
tags: SPROP:3/day on command, automatically refects the next nine levels of spells cast at the wearer, exactly as if spell turning had been cast upon the wearer.

items.name: Ring of Water Walking
tags: SPROP:Allows the wearer to continually utilize the effects of the spell Water Walk.

items.name: Rod (Alertness)
tags: SPROP:Enables the holder to use detect evil, detect good, detect chaos, detect law, detect magic, discern lies, light, or see invisibility as a standard action

items.name: Rod (Withering)
tags: SPROP:Deals 1d4 temporary STR and CON damage

items.name: Potion of Aid
tags: SPROP:+1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs. fear, plus 1d8+1 temporary hp for 1 minute

items.name: Potion of Barkskin +2
tags: SPROP:+2 enhancement bonus to natural armor for 30 minutes

items.name: Potion of Barkskin +3
tags: SPROP:+3 enhancement bonus to natural armor for 60 minutes

items.name: Potion of Barkskin +4
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to natural armor for 90 minutes

items.name: Potion of Barkskin +5
tags: SPROP:+5 enhancement bonus to natural armor for 120 minutes

items.name: Potion of Bear's Endurance
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to Constitution for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Blur
tags: SPROP:Grants concealment (20% miss chance) for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Bull's Strength
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to Strength for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Cat's Grace
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Delay Poison
tags: SPROP:Become immune to poison for 3 hours

items.name: Potion of Eagle's Splendor
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to Charisma for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Endure Elements
tags: SPROP:Grants protection from harm from being in a hot or cold environment for 24 hours

items.name: Potion of Enlarge Person
tags: SPROP:Target's size category increases to next larger category for 1 minute

items.name: Potion of Fly
tags: SPROP:Gain fly speed 60 ft. with good maneuverability and +2 bonus to Fly checks for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Fox's Cunning
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Good Hope
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on saving throws, attack rolls, ability checks, skill checks, and weapon damage rolls for 7 minutes

items.name: Potion of Greater Magic Fang +1
tags: SPROP:+1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with all natural weapons

items.name: Potion of Greater Magic Fang +2
tags: SPROP:+2 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with one single natural weapon

items.name: Potion of Greater Magic Fang +3
tags: SPROP:+3 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with one single natural weapon

items.name: Potion of Greater Magic Fang +4
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with one single natural weapon

items.name: Potion of Greater Magic Fang +5
tags: SPROP:+5 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with one single natural weapon

items.name: Potion of Haste
tags: SPROP:Gain additional attack, move faster, +1 on attack rolls, +1 dodge bonus to AC and Reflex saves for 5 rounds

items.name: Potion of Heroism
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks for 50 minutes

items.name: Potion of Hide from Animals
tags: SPROP:Target cannot be perceived by animals for 10 minutes

items.name: Potion of Hide from Undead
tags: SPROP:Target cannot be perceived by undead for 10 minutes

items.name: Potion of Invisibility
tags: SPROP:Grants invisibility for 3 minutes or until you attack

items.name: Potion of Jump
tags: SPROP:+10 enhancement bonus on Acrobatics checks made to jump for 1 minute

items.name: Potion of Lesser Restoration
tags: SPROP:Dispels magical ability penalty or cures 1d4 points of ability damage to one ability score

items.name: Potion of Levitate
tags: SPROP:Levitate up or down for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Mage Armor
tags: SPROP:+4 armor bonus to AC for 1 hour

items.name: Potion of Magic Fang
tags: SPROP:+1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls with one single natural weapon

items.name: Potion of Neutralize Poison
tags: SPROP:Detoxify any sort of venom with a caster level check at +5

items.name: Potion of Nondetection
tags: SPROP:Become difficult to detect by divination spells for 5 hours

items.name: Potion of Owl's Wisdom
tags: SPROP:+4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom for 3 minutes

items.name: Potion of Pass without Trace
tags: SPROP:Leave no footprints or scent trail while moving for 1 hour

items.name: Potion of Protection from Arrows
tags: SPROP:Gain damage reduction 10/Magic against ranged weapons for 3 hours, or until 30 points of damage have been prevented

items.name: Potion of Protection from Chaos
tags: SPROP:+2 deflection bonus to AC, +2 resistance bonus to saves, gain protection from mental control and summoned creatures for 1 minute. Protects from attacks by chaotic creatures only.

items.name: Potion of Protection from Energy (Acid)
tags: SPROP:Grants immunity to acid for 50 minutes or until 60 points of acid damage have been prevented

items.name: Potion of Protection from Energy (Cold)
tags: SPROP:Grants immunity to cold for 50 minutes or until 60 points of cold damage have been prevented

items.name: Potion of Protection from Energy (Electricity)
tags: SPROP:Grants immunity to electricity for 50 minutes or until 60 points of electricity damage have been prevented

items.name: Potion of Protection from Energy (Fire)
tags: SPROP:Grants immunity to fire for 50 minutes or until 60 points of fire damage have been prevented

items.name: Potion of Protection from Energy (Sonic)
tags: SPROP:Grants immunity to sonic for 50 minutes or until 60 points of sonic damage have been prevented

items.name: Potion of Protection from Evil
tags: SPROP:+2 deflection bonus to AC, +2 resistance bonus to saves, gain protection from mental control and summoned creatures for 1 minute. Protects from attacks by evil creatures only.

items.name: Potion of Protection from Good
tags: SPROP:+2 deflection bonus to AC, +2 resistance bonus to saves, gain protection from mental control and summoned creatures for 1 minute. Protects from attacks by good creatures only.

items.name: Potion of Protection from Law
tags: SPROP:+2 deflection bonus to AC, +2 resistance bonus to saves, gain protection from mental control and summoned creatures for 1 minute. Protects from attacks by lawful creatures only.

items.name: Potion of Rage
tags: SPROP:+2 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, +1 morale bonus on Will saves, and -2 penalty to AC for 3 rounds

items.name: Potion of Reduce Person
tags: SPROP:Target's size category decreases to next smaller category for 1 minute

items.name: Potion of Remove Curse
tags: SPROP:Removes curses with a caster level check at +5

items.name: Potion of Remove Disease
tags: SPROP:Cures diseases with a caster level check at +5

items.name: Potion of Remove Fear
tags: SPROP:Suppresses existing fear effect, +4 morale bonus on saves against fear, or for 10 minutes

items.name: Potion of Remove Paralysis
tags: SPROP:Frees target from temporary paralysis or related magical effects

items.name: Potion of Sanctuary
tags: SPROP:Opponent must succed at a DC 11 Will save to attack target for 1 round

items.name: Potion of Shield of Faith +2
tags: SPROP:+2 deflection bonus to AC for 1 minutes

items.name: Potion of Shield of Faith +3
tags: SPROP:+3 deflection bonus to AC for 6 minutes

items.name: Potion of Shield of Faith +4
tags: SPROP:+4 deflection bonus to AC for 12 minutes

items.name: Potion of Shield of Faith +5
tags: SPROP:+5 deflection bonus to AC for 18 minutes

items.name: Potion of Spider Climb
tags: SPROP:Climb and travel on vertical surfaces for 30 minutes

items.name: Potion of Tongues
tags: SPROP:Speak and understand the language of any intelligent creature for 50 minutes

items.name: Potion of Undetectable Alignment
tags: SPROP:Conceals target's alignment from divination spells and effects for 24 hours

items.name: Potion of Water Walk
tags: SPROP:Tread on any liquid for 50 minutes

items.name: Oil of Bless Weapon
tags: SPROP:This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes. Duration 1 minute.

items.name: Oil of Darkness
tags: SPROP:Object radiates darkness out to a 20-foot radius for 3 minutes.

items.name: Oil of Daylight
tags: SPROP:Object radiates light out to a 20-foot radius for 3 minutes.

items.name: Oil of Flame Arrow
tags: SPROP:Turn up to 50 projectiles into fiery projectiles. Duration 30 minutes.

items.name: Oil of Greater Magic Weapon +1
tags: SPROP:Gives a weapon or 50 projectiles a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls for 5 hours.

items.name: Oil of Greater Magic Weapon +2
tags: SPROP:Gives a weapon or 50 projectiles a +2 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls for 8 hours.

items.name: Oil of Greater Magic Weapon +3
tags: SPROP:Gives a weapon or 50 projectiles a +3 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls for 12 hours.

items.name: Oil of Greater Magic Weapon +4
tags: SPROP:Gives a weapon or 50 projectiles a +4 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls for 16 hours.

items.name: Oil of Greater Magic Weapon +5
tags: SPROP:Gives a weapon or 50 projectiles a +5 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls for 20 hours.

items.name: Oil of Keen Edge
tags: SPROP:Doubles normal weapon's threat range for 50 minutes.

items.name: Oil of Silence
tags: SPROP:Complete silence prevails in a 20in the affected area

items.name: Oil of Levitate
tags: SPROP:Allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish for 3 minutes.

items.name: Oil of Magic Stone
tags: SPROP:Transmute as many as three pebbles, which can be no larger than sling bullets, so that they strike with great force when thrown or slung. Lasts 30 minutes or until discharged.

items.name: Oil of Magic Vestment +1
tags: SPROP:Imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement bonus of +1 for 5 hours.

items.name: Oil of Magic Vestment +2
tags: SPROP:Imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement bonus of +1 for 8 hours.

items.name: Oil of Magic Vestment +3
tags: SPROP:Imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement bonus of +1 for 12 hours.

items.name: Oil of Magic Vestment +4
tags: SPROP:Imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement bonus of +1 for 16 hours.

items.name: Oil of Magic Vestment +5
tags: SPROP:Imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement bonus of +1 for 20 hours.

items.name: Oil of Magic Weapon
tags: SPROP:Gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls for 1 minute.

items.name: Oil of Shillelagh
tags: SPROP:nonmagical club or quarterstaff becomes a weapon with a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls. Duration 1 minute.

items.name: Wand of Acid Splash
tags: SPROP:You fire a small orb of acid at the target dealing 1d3 points of acid damage.

items.name: Wand of Arcane Mark
tags: SPROP:This spell allows you to inscribe your personal rune or mark.

items.name: Wand of Bleed
tags: SPROP:You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.

items.name: Wand of Create Water
tags: SPROP:This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.

items.name: Wand of Dancing Lights
tags: SPROP:You create up to four lights that resemble lanterns or torches.

items.name: Wand of Daze
tags: SPROP:This spell clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer Hit Dice so that it takes no actions.

items.name: Wand of Detect Poison
tags: SPROP:You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

items.name: Wand of Disrupt Undead
tags: SPROP:You direct a ray of positive energy dealing 1d6 points of damage to Undead.

items.name: Wand of Flare
tags: SPROP:This cantrip creates a burst of light.

items.name: Wand of Ghost Sound
tags: SPROP:Ghost sound allows you to create a volume of sound that rises, recedes, approaches, or remains at a fixed place.

items.name: Wand of Guidance
tags: SPROP:This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.

items.name: Wand of Know Direction
tags: SPROP:When you cast this spell, you instantly know the direction of north from your current position.

items.name: Wand of Light
tags: SPROP:This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.

items.name: Wand of Lullaby
tags: SPROP:Any creature within the area that fails a Will save becomes drowsy and inattentive, taking a -5 penalty on Perception checks and a -2 penalty on Will saves against sleep effects while the lullaby is in effect.

items.name: Wand of Mage Hand
tags: SPROP:You point your finger at an object and can lift it and move it at will from a distance.

items.name: Wand of Mending
tags: SPROP:This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.

items.name: Wand of Message
tags: SPROP:You can whisper messages and receive whispered replies.

items.name: Wand of Open/Close
tags: SPROP:You can open or close (your choice) a door, chest, box, window, bag, pouch, bottle, barrel, or other container.

items.name: Wand of Prestidigitation
tags: SPROP:Prestidigitations are minor tricks that novice spellcasters use for practice.

items.name: Wand of Purify Food and Drink
tags: SPROP:This spell makes spoiled, rotten, diseased, poisonous, or otherwise contaminated food and water pure and suitable for eating and drinking.

items.name: Wand of Ray of Frost
tags: SPROP:A ray of freezing air and ice projects from your pointing finger dealing 1d3 points of cold damage.

items.name: Wand of Read Magic
tags: SPROP:You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.

items.name: Wand of Resistance
tags: SPROP:You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

items.name: Wand of Stabilize
tags: SPROP:Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.

items.name: Wand of Summon Instrument
tags: SPROP:This spell summons one handheld musical instrument of your choice.

items.name: Wand of Touch of Fatigue
tags: SPROP:You channel negative energy through your touch, fatiguing the target.

items.name: Wand of Virtue
tags: SPROP:With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.

items.name: Wand of Alarm
tags: SPROP:Alarm creates a subtle ward on an area you select.

items.name: Wand of Bane
tags: SPROP:Bane fills your enemies with fear and doubt.

items.name: Wand of Bless
tags: SPROP:Bless fills your allies with courage.

items.name: Wand of Bless Water
tags: SPROP:This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.

items.name: Wand of Bless Weapon
tags: SPROP:This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.

items.name: Wand of Burning Hands
tags: SPROP:A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingertips dealing 1d4/level, max 5d4 points of fire damage to any creature in the effect area.

items.name: Wand of Calm Animals
tags: SPROP:This spell soothes and quiets animals, rendering them docile and harmless.

items.name: Wand of Charm Animal
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like charm person, except that it affects a creature of the animal type.

items.name: Wand of Charm Person
tags: SPROP:This charm makes a humanoid creature regard you as its trusted friend and ally.

items.name: Wand of Chill Touch
tags: SPROP:A touch from your hand, which glows with blue energy, disrupts the life force of living creatures dealing 1d6 points of damage.

items.name: Wand of Color Spray
tags: SPROP:A vivid cone of clashing colors springs forth from your hand, causing creatures to become stunned, perhaps also blinded, and possibly knocking them unconscious.

items.name: Wand of Command
tags: SPROP:You give the subject a single command, which it obeys to the best of its ability at its earliest opportunity.

items.name: Wand of Comprehend Languages
tags: SPROP:You can understand the spoken words of creatures or read otherwise incomprehensible written messages.

items.name: Wand of Confusion (Lesser)
tags: SPROP:This spell causes a single creature to become confused for 1 round.

items.name: Wand of Cure Light Wounds
tags: SPROP:When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+1/level, max 5 points of damage.

items.name: Wand of Curse Water
tags: SPROP:This spell imbues a flask (1 pint) of water with negative energy, turning it into unholy water.

items.name: Wand of Deathwatch
tags: SPROP:Using the powers of necromancy, you can determine the condition of creatures near death within the spell's range.

items.name: Wand of Detect Chaos
tags: SPROP:You can sense the auras of chaotic creatures.

items.name: Wand of Detect Evil
tags: SPROP:You can sense the presence of evil.

items.name: Wand of Detect Good
tags: SPROP:You can sense the presence of good.

items.name: Wand of Detect Law
tags: SPROP:You can sense the auras of lawful creatures.

items.name: Wand of Detect Secret Doors
tags: SPROP:You can detect secret doors, compartments, caches, and so forth.

items.name: Wand of Detect Snares and Pits
tags: SPROP:You can detect simple pits, deadfalls, and snares as well as mechanical traps constructed of natural materials.

items.name: Wand of Detect Undead
tags: SPROP:You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.

items.name: Wand of Disguise Self
tags: SPROP:You make yourself--including clothing, armor, weapons, and equipment--look different.

items.name: Wand of Divine Favor
tags: SPROP:Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +1 to +3 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.

items.name: Wand of Doom
tags: SPROP:This spell fills a single subject with a feeling of horrible dread that causes it to become shaken.

items.name: Wand of Endure Elements
tags: SPROP:A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.

items.name: Wand of Enlarge Person
tags: SPROP:This spell causes instant growth of a humanoid creature, doubling its height and multiplying its weight by 8.

items.name: Wand of Entangle
tags: SPROP:This spell causes tall grass, weeds, and other plants to wrap around foes in the area of effect or those that enter the area.

items.name: Wand of Entropic Shield
tags: SPROP:A magical field appears around you, glowing with a chaotic blast of multicolored hues deflecting incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks.

items.name: Wand of Erase
tags: SPROP:Erase removes writings of either magical or mundane nature from a scroll or from one or two pages of paper, parchment, or similar surfaces.

items.name: Wand of Expeditious Retreat
tags: SPROP:This spell increases your base land speed by 30 feet.

items.name: Wand of Faerie Fire
tags: SPROP:A pale glow surrounds and outlines the subjects who shed light as candles.

items.name: Wand of Feather Fall
tags: SPROP:The affected creatures or objects fall slowly.

items.name: Wand of Floating Disk
tags: SPROP:You create a slightly concave, circular plane of force that follows you about and carries loads for you.

items.name: Wand of Goodberry
tags: SPROP:Casting goodberry makes 2d4 freshly picked berries magical.

items.name: Wand of Grease
tags: SPROP:A grease spell covers a solid surface with a layer of slippery grease.

items.name: Wand of Hide from Animals
tags: SPROP:Animals cannot sense the warded creatures.

items.name: Wand of Hide from Undead
tags: SPROP:Undead cannot see, hear, or smell creatures warded by this spell.

items.name: Wand of Hold Portal
tags: SPROP:This spell magically holds shut a door, gate, window, or shutter of wood, metal, or stone.

items.name: Wand of Hypnotism
tags: SPROP:Your gestures and droning incantation fascinate nearby creatures, causing them to stop and stare blankly at you.

items.name: Wand of Identify
tags: SPROP:This spell functions as detect magic, except that it gives you a +10 enhancement bonus on Spellcraft checks made to identify the properties and command words of magic items in your possession.

items.name: Wand of Inflict Light Wounds
tags: SPROP:When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 1d8+1/level, max 5 points of damage.

items.name: Wand of Jump
tags: SPROP:The subject gets a +10 enhancement bonus on Acrobatics checks made to attempt high jumps or long jumps.

items.name: Wand of Longstrider
tags: SPROP:This spell gives you a +10 foot enhancement bonus to your base speed.

items.name: Wand of Mage Armor
tags: SPROP:An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.

items.name: Wand of Magic Fang
tags: SPROP:Magic fang gives one natural weapon or unarmed strike of the subject a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

items.name: Wand of Magic Missile
tags: SPROP:1 to 5 missiles that do 1d4+1 damage each.

items.name: Wand of Magic Stone
tags: SPROP:You transmute as many as three pebbles, which can be no larger than sling bullets, so that they strike with great force when thrown or slung.

items.name: Wand of Magic Weapon
tags: SPROP:Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

items.name: Wand of Mount
tags: SPROP:You summon a light horse or a pony (your choice) to serve you as a mount.

items.name: Wand of Obscuring Mist
tags: SPROP:A misty, stationary vapor arises around you obscuring all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet.

items.name: Wand of Pass without Trace
tags: SPROP:The subject or subjects of this spell do not leave footprints or a scent trail while moving.

items.name: Wand of Produce Flame
tags: SPROP:Flames as bright as a torch appear in your open hand.

items.name: Wand of Protection from Chaos
tags: SPROP:This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

items.name: Wand of Protection from Evil
tags: SPROP:This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

items.name: Wand of Protection from Good
tags: SPROP:This spell wards a creature from attacks by good creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

items.name: Wand of Protection from Law
tags: SPROP:This spell wards a creature from attacks by lawful creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

items.name: Wand of Ray of Enfeeblement
tags: SPROP:A coruscating ray springs from your hand, the subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+1/two level, max +5.

items.name: Wand of Reduce Person
tags: SPROP:This spell causes instant diminution of a humanoid creature, halving its height, length, and width and dividing its weight by 8.

items.name: Wand of Remove Fear
tags: SPROP:You instill courage in the subject, granting it a +4 morale bonus against fear effects for 10 minutes.

items.name: Wand of Sanctuary
tags: SPROP:Any opponent attempting to directly attack the warded creature, even with a targeted spell, must attempt a Will save.

items.name: Wand of Shield
tags: SPROP:Shield creates an invisible shield of force that hovers in front of you.

items.name: Wand of Shield of Faith
tags: SPROP:This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the target that averts and deflects attacks.

items.name: Wand of Shillelagh
tags: SPROP:Your own nonmagical club or quarterstaff becomes a weapon with a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

items.name: Wand of Shocking Grasp
tags: SPROP:Your successful melee touch attack deals 1d6/level, max 5d6 points of electricity damage.

items.name: Wand of Silent Image
tags: SPROP:This spell creates the visual illusion of an object, creature, or force, as visualized by you.

items.name: Wand of Sleep
tags: SPROP:A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 4 HD of creatures.

items.name: Wand of Summon Monster I
tags: SPROP:This spell summons an extraplanar creature.

items.name: Wand of Summon Nature's Ally I
tags: SPROP:This spell summons to your side a natural creature (typically an animal, fey, magical beast, outsider with the elemental subtype, or a giant).

items.name: Wand of True Strike
tags: SPROP:You gain temporary, intuitive insight into the immediate future during your next attack.

items.name: Wand of Unseen Servant
tags: SPROP:An unseen servant is an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.

items.name: Wand of Ventriloquism
tags: SPROP:You can make your voice seem to issue from someplace else.

items.name: Wand of Acid Arrow
tags: SPROP:An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target dealing 2d4 points of acid damage.

items.name: Wand of Aid
tags: SPROP:Aid grants +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs fear effects, plus 1d8 + Level (max 10) temporary hit points.

items.name: Wand of Align Weapon
tags: SPROP:Align weapon makes a weapon chaotic, evil, good, or lawful, as you choose.

items.name: Wand of Alter Self
tags: SPROP:You can assume the form of any Small or Medium creature of the humanoid type.

items.name: Wand of Animal Messenger
tags: SPROP:You compel a Tiny animal to go to a spot you designate.

items.name: Wand of Animal Trance
tags: SPROP:Your swaying motions and music (or singing, or chanting) compel animals and magical beasts to do nothing but watch you.

items.name: Wand of Arcane Lock
tags: SPROP:An arcane lock spell cast upon a door, chest, or portal magically locks it.

items.name: Wand of Augury
tags: SPROP:An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.

items.name: Wand of Barkskin
tags: SPROP:Barkskin toughens a creature's skin granting an enhancement bonus to the creature's existing natural armor bonus.

items.name: Wand of Bear's Endurance
tags: SPROP:The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina granting the subject a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.

items.name: Wand of Blindness/Deafness
tags: SPROP:You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject blinded or deafened, as you choose.

items.name: Wand of Blur
tags: SPROP:The subject's outline appears blurred, shifting, and wavering granting the subject concealment (20%% miss chance).

items.name: Wand of Bull's Strength
tags: SPROP:The subject becomes stronger granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.

items.name: Wand of Cat's Grace
tags: SPROP:The transmuted creature becomes more graceful, agile, and coordinated granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

items.name: Wand of Chill Metal
tags: SPROP:Chill metal makes metal extremely cold.

items.name: Wand of Command Undead
tags: SPROP:This spell allows you a degree of control over an undead creature.

items.name: Wand of Continual Flame
tags: SPROP:A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch.

items.name: Wand of Cure Moderate Wounds
tags: SPROP:When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+level [max 10] points of damage.

items.name: Wand of Darkness
tags: SPROP:This spell causes an object to radiate darkness out to a 20-foot radius.

items.name: Wand of Darkvision
tags: SPROP:The subject gains the ability to see 60 feet even in total darkness.

items.name: Wand of Daze Monster
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like daze, but it can affect any one living creature of any type.

items.name: Wand of Death Knell
tags: SPROP:You draw forth the ebbing life force of a creature and use it to fuel your own power.

items.name: Wand of Delay Poison
tags: SPROP:The subject becomes temporarily immune to poison.

items.name: Wand of Eagle's Splendor
tags: SPROP:The transmuted creature becomes more poised, articulate, and personally forceful gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

items.name: Wand of Enthrall
tags: SPROP:If you have the attention of a group of creatures, you can use this spell to hold them enthralled.

items.name: Wand of False Life
tags: SPROP:You harness the power of unlife to grant yourself a limited ability to avoid death.

items.name: Wand of Find Traps
tags: SPROP:You gain intuitive insight into the workings of traps.

items.name: Wand of Flame Blade
tags: SPROP:A 3-foot-long, blazing beam of red-hot fire springs forth from your hand.

items.name: Wand of Flaming Sphere
tags: SPROP:A burning globe of fire rolls in whichever direction you point and burns those it strikes.

items.name: Wand of Fog Cloud
tags: SPROP:A bank of fog billows out from the point you designate.

items.name: Wand of Fox's Cunning
tags: SPROP:The target becomes smarter granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

items.name: Wand of Gentle Repose
tags: SPROP:You preserve the remains of a dead creature so that they do not decay.

items.name: Wand of Ghoul Touch
tags: SPROP:Imbuing you with negative energy, this spell allows you to paralyze a single living humanoid for the duration of the spell with a successful melee touch attack.

items.name: Wand of Glitterdust
tags: SPROP:A cloud of golden particles covers everyone and everything in the area, causing creatures to become blinded and visibly outlining invisible things for the duration of the spell.

items.name: Wand of Heat Metal
tags: SPROP:Heat metal causes metal objects to become red-hot.

items.name: Wand of Hideous Laughter
tags: SPROP:This spell afflicts the subject with uncontrollable laughter.

items.name: Wand of Hold Animal
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects an animal instead of a humanoid.

items.name: Wand of Hold Person
tags: SPROP:The subject becomes paralyzed and freezes in place.

items.name: Wand of Hypnotic Pattern
tags: SPROP:A twisting pattern of subtle, shifting colors weaves through the air, fascinating creatures within it.

items.name: Wand of Inflict Moderate Wounds
tags: SPROP:When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 2d8+level [max 10] points of damage.

items.name: Wand of Invisibility
tags: SPROP:The creature or object touched becomes invisible.

items.name: Wand of Knock
tags: SPROP:Knock opens stuck, barred, or locked doors, as well as those subject to hold portal or arcane lock.

items.name: Wand of Levitate
tags: SPROP:Levitate allows you to move yourself, another creature, or an object up and down as you wish.

items.name: Wand of Locate Object
tags: SPROP:You sense the direction of a well-known or clearly visualized object.

items.name: Wand of Make Whole
tags: SPROP:This spell functions as mending, except that it repairs 1/level, max 5d6 points of damage when cast on a construct creature.

items.name: Wand of Minor Image
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like silent image, except that minor image includes some minor sounds but not understandable speech.

items.name: Wand of Mirror Image
tags: SPROP:This spell creates a number of illusory doubles of you that inhabit your square.

items.name: Wand of Misdirection
tags: SPROP:By means of this spell, you misdirect the information from divination spells that reveal auras (detect evil, detect magic, discern lies, and the like).

items.name: Wand of Obscure Object
tags: SPROP:A misty, stationary vapor arises around you obscuring all sight, including darkvision, beyond 5 feet.

items.name: Wand of Owl's Wisdom
tags: SPROP:The transmuted creature becomes wiser gaining a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

items.name: Wand of Protection from Arrows
tags: SPROP:The warded creature gains resistance to ranged weapons.

items.name: Wand of Pyrotechnics
tags: SPROP:Pyrotechnics turns a fire into a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke, depending on your choice.

items.name: Wand of Rage
tags: SPROP:Each affected creature gains a +2 morale bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +1 morale bonus on Will saves, and a -2 penalty to AC.

items.name: Wand of Reduce Animal
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like reduce person, except that it affects a single willing animal.

items.name: Wand of Remove Paralysis
tags: SPROP:You can free one or more creatures from the effects of temporary paralysis or related magic.

items.name: Wand of Resist Energy
tags: SPROP:This abjuration grants a creature limited protection from damage of whichever one of five energy types you select.

items.name: Wand of Restoration (Lesser)
tags: SPROP:Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.

items.name: Wand of Rope Trick
tags: SPROP:When this spell is cast upon a piece of rope from 5 to 30 feet ,long, one end of the rope rises into the air until the whole rope hangs perpendicular to the ground, as if affixed at the upper end.

items.name: Wand of Scare
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like cause fear, except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become frightened.

items.name: Wand of Scorching Ray
tags: SPROP:You blast your enemies with up to 1-3 searing beams of fire dealing 4d6 points of fire damage.

items.name: Wand of See Invisibility
tags: SPROP:You can see any objects or beings that are invisible within your range of vision, as well as any that are ethereal, as if they were normally visible.

items.name: Wand of Shatter
tags: SPROP:Shatter creates a loud, ringing noise that breaks brittle, nonmagical objects; sunders a single solid, nonmagical object; or damages a crystalline creature.

items.name: Wand of Shield Other
tags: SPROP:This spell wards the subject and creates a mystic connection between you and the subject so that some of its wounds are transferred to you.

items.name: Wand of Silence
tags: SPROP:Upon the casting of this spell, complete silence prevails in the affected area.

items.name: Wand of Sound Burst
tags: SPROP:You blast an area with a tremendous cacophony.

items.name: Wand of Spectral Hand
tags: SPROP:A ghostly hand shaped from your life force materializes and moves as you desire, allowing you to deliver low-level, touch range spells at a distance.

items.name: Wand of Spider Climb
tags: SPROP:The subject can climb and travel on vertical surfaces or even traverse ceilings as well as a spider does.

items.name: Wand of Spiritual Weapon
tags: SPROP:A weapon made of force appears and attacks foes at a distance, as you direct it, dealing 1d8+ 1 to 5 force damage per hit.

items.name: Wand of Status
tags: SPROP:When you need to keep track of comrades who may get separated, status allows you to mentally monitor their relative positions and general condition.

items.name: Wand of Summon Monster II
tags: SPROP:This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 2nd-level list or 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.

items.name: Wand of Summon Nature's Ally II
tags: SPROP:This spell functions as summon nature's ally I, except that you summon one 2nd-level creature or 1d3 1st-level creatures of the same kind.

items.name: Wand of Summon Swarm
tags: SPROP:You summon a swarm of bats, rats, or spiders (your choice), which attacks all other creatures within its area.

items.name: Wand of Touch of Idiocy
tags: SPROP:With a touch, you reduce the target's mental faculties.

items.name: Wand of Tree Shape
tags: SPROP:This spell allows you to assume the form of a Large living tree or shrub or a Large dead tree trunk with a small number of limbs.

items.name: Wand of Undetectable Alignment
tags: SPROP:An undetectable alignment spell conceals the alignment of an object or a creature from all forms of divination.

items.name: Wand of Warp Wood
tags: SPROP:You cause wood to bend and warp, permanently destroying its straightness, form, and strength.

items.name: Wand of Web
tags: SPROP:Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them.

items.name: Wand of Whispering Wind
tags: SPROP:You send a message or sound on the wind to a designated spot.

items.name: Wand of Wood Shape
tags: SPROP:Wood shape enables you to form one existing piece of wood into any shape that suits your purpose.

items.name: Wand of Zone of Truth
tags: SPROP:Creatures within the emanation area (or those who enter it) can't speak any deliberate and intentional lies.

items.name: Wand of Create Food and Water
Wand of Magic Circle Against Chaos
Wand of Magic Circle Against Evil
Wand of Magic Circle Against Good
Wand of Magic Circle Against Law
Wand of Summon Nature's Ally III
Wand of Imbue with Spell Ability
Wand of Summon Nature's Ally IV
Wand of Detect Animals or Plants
Wand of Soften Earth and Stone

header:
# CVS $Revision: 21407 $ $Author: evilmynex $ -- Fri Jun 17 21:51:56 2016 -- reformated by PCGen PrettyLST v6.06.00
SOURCELONG:Core Rulebook	SOURCESHORT:CR	SOURCEWEB:http://paizo.com/store/downloads/pathfinder/pathfinderRPG/v5748btpy88yj	SOURCEDATE:2009-08
# Original RSRD Entry by: PCGen Data Team
# Pathfinder RPG Entry by: Stefan Radermacher and Andrew McDougall (Tir Gwaith) and Maredudd (Eric C Smith)
# Incorporated 05/30/2013 errata (Stefan Radermacher)
